div.p: 2010 Occupation coding system used by CDC (NIOSH and NCHS) for coding occupation text. Occupation describes a set of activities or tasks that individuals are paid to perform or, if unpaid, define a person's contribution to a household/family business/community.

description.value: 2010 Occupation coding system used by CDC (NIOSH and NCHS) for coding occupation text. Occupation describes a set of activities or tasks that individuals are paid to perform or, if unpaid, define a person's contribution to a household/family business/community.
